.. include:: /properties.rst
   
.. |Dbox|  replace::  :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">cuga</span>`
.. |Cbox-t|  replace::  :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">ugcucu</span>`
.. |Dbox-1|  replace::  :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">auguua</span>`  
.. |Dbox-t|  replace::  :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">uuga</span>`   
.. |targetRNA|  replace:: 25S rRNA
.. |target| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">gagg<a href="../18s-tab.html#snr48_25S" title="25S target">T</a>gccag</span>`
.. |ortholog| replace:: :raw-html:`yeast <a href="http://snoopy.med.miyazaki-u.ac.jp/snorna_db.cgi?mode=sno_info&id=Saccharomyces_cerevisiae300018">snR48</a>, human <a href="http://snoopy.med.miyazaki-u.ac.jp/snorna_db.cgi?mode=sno_info&id=Homo_sapiens300262">SNORD60</a>`


snR48-SNORD60
=============


- snR48-SNORD60_intronic-boxCDsnoRNA-127nt
- Within spliced transcript as CNAG_12216

:raw-html:`<table><tr><th>&nbsp;<i>C.&nbsp;neoformans</i></th><th>&nbsp;</th><th><i>Tremellomycetes</i> snR48</th>`

:raw-html:`<tr><td>`

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/snr48_h99_igb.png
   :name: snr48_cnag12216
   :align: left
   :width: 1389 px
   :height: 646 px
   :scale: 40%

:raw-html:`</td><td>&nbsp;</td><td>`

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/snR48-r2r-opt.svg
   :name: snr48_r2r
   :align: left
   :width: 257 px
   :height: 752 px
   :scale: 50%



:raw-html:`</td></tr></table>`

- Putative target in |targetRNA|\ : |target|
- In yeast multiple modification by snR48 is linked to an irregular D' box (\ |Dbox-1|) acting as two, partially overlapping |Dbox| motifs, affecting the positioning of Nop1/fibrillarin so that two nucleotides, separated by one base, get methylated in the same target sequence [van.Nues-2016_]. In *Tremellomycetes*, if the putative D' box (\ |Dbox-t|) controls positioning of Nop1/fibrillarin, 2'-O-methylation of the 'in-between' nucleotide could be expected. The 5' *U* in the motif, however, could be part of the guide region that base-pairs to the target sequence, and this, combined with an irregular C' box (putatively |Cbox-t|) might change the organization of the proteins and the positioning of the methylase. Thus, a different modification pattern might occur which can only be determined experimentally. 
- Orthologue of |ortholog|

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/snR48-SNORD60-aligned.png
   :name: snr48-align
   :align: left
   :width: 2865 px
   :height: 378 px
   :scale: 30%
   :figwidth: 100%
